port.title: HTTP サーバーのポート番号

dotfiles.title: dotfiles
dotfiles.description: Determines how dotfiles (files or directories that begin with a dot “.”) are treated.

extensions.title: extensions
extensions.description: Sets file extension fallbacks: If a file is not found, search for files with the specified extensions and serve the first one found. Example: ['html', 'htm'].

fallthrough.title: fallthrough
fallthrough.description: Let client errors fall-through as unhandled requests, otherwise forward a client error.

immutable.title: immutable
immutable.description: Enable or disable the immutable directive in the Cache-Control response header. If enabled, the maxAge option should also be specified to enable caching. The immutable directive will prevent supported clients from making conditional requests during the life of the maxAge option to check if the file has changed.

index.title: index
index.description: Sends the specified directory index file. Set to false to disable directory indexing.

last_modified.title: last_modified
last_modified.description: Set the Last-Modified header to the last modified date of the file on the OS.

max_age.title: max_age
max_age.description: Set the max-age property of the Cache-Control header in milliseconds or a string in ms format.

redirect.title: redirect
redirect.description: Redirect to trailing “/” when the pathname is a directory.

set_headers.title: set_headers
set_headers.description: Function for setting HTTP headers to serve with the file.

mime.title: MIME と拡張子の紐付け

views.title: テンプレートディレクトリ
